title.narrative: Sustainable Landscape In Merapi & Merbabu Volcano Region

description.narrative: Majority of farmers in Merapi and Merbabu surrounding areas are reliant on subsistence agriculture. As they are operating at small-scale so they face challenges of lack of skill and knowledge, access to technologies, low productivity, profitability and lack of access to the wider market. The project interventions are focused on community based sustainable landscape practices, along with enhanced knowledge of farmers about sustainable agriculture, climate smart practices and broader access to market. Public and private sector stakeholders would be engaged through multi-stakeholder platform. The knowledge and application of climate smart agriculture practices would build farmers resilience to climate change and contribute for enhancing livelihood and food security.
